text: Niscaya yisakale kupharai karaiche arau manuhaka allahara pathara paraa nibrtta karaiche lagate sihamtara ocarata hidayata suspasta horaara pichato raachulara biraodhita karaiche, sihamte ketiya'o allahara kono ksati karaiba noraaraiba. Atisighrae te'om sihamtara amalasamuha nisphala karai diba
